title: I Steal Bodies
itunes:title: I Steal Bodies
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
What would you do?

***

Written by Devin Hoover

***

Don't miss the premiere events of 3 From Hell at https://www.fathomevents.com/events/rob-zombies-3-from-hell

***

See how you can get rewarded by supporting the show at Patreon.com/Creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin, Puzzle Audio

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Artwork by Dakota Miller *** Intro/outro narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
